title: Regular Old Bogan
text:
Regular Old Bogan is an Australian <a href="animated%20sitcom">animated sitcom</a> that premiered on <a href="7mate">7mate</a> on 26 October 2020. It is created by Mark Nicholson and Sebastian Peart from
Melbourne Production company Stepmates Studios.
The series was added to <a href="Tubi">Tubi</a> in August 2021.
Synopsis.
Described as Australia’s answer to <a href="South%20Park">South Park</a>, the series will follow the Stubbs family who will encounter outrageous situations from getting lost in the outback, to facing Death Row in a Balinese prison.
